ConfigItem.Name: KIXMobileApp::TicketDynamicFields
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a list of Ticket Dynamic Fields which are evaluated by the KIXMobileApp. The lists consists of dynamic field names (e.g. 'MobileProcessingState') or regular expressions matching dynamic field names (e.g. 'MobileProcessingChecklist.*').

ConfigItem.Name: KIXMobileApp::GeoPosition::ChangeThreshold
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the minimum position changes required to report a new position for the user of the KIX Field Agent App. The distance is given in meters. The value must be given in natural numbers greater than zero. Invalid settings cause the app to use a default value.

ConfigItem.Name: KIXMobileApp::GeoPosition::EnabledByDefault
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the initial setting of the position reporting behavior of the KIX Field Agent app when the user first logs into the app on a device. The app-specific setting applies to further use.
